desc: Buy 100% Organic Cotton, Biodegradable and environmentally friendly Tampons & Pads Online! Find here the best organic period care products.

layout.text: ‘Femme’ is not a means to pin menstruation to the female gender, but rather an ode to the feminine energy each human possesses to differing extents. The characteristics of that feminine energy are free-flowing and know no rules or bounds. This is the energy we want our customers to approach their periods with. With a gentle hand, making sure to be kind to ourselves as Mother Nature takes its course.
